form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE, FORM I-4

full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/21/2023 NITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUNICE IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE 300 North Los Angeles Street Los Angeles, California 90012 A17 181 791 TO/245/SIO FILE NO.: DATE: June 10, 1970 RETURN IN THE ENCLOSED ENVELOPE Kiss Betty Fei-Ing Nao A COPY OF THIS LETTER SIGNED BY 720 South San Bafael THE U.S.PUBLIC HEALTH DOCTOR. Pasadena, California 91105 Thomas Waterhouse, Esquire 99 So. Lake Ave., Suite 570 Pasadena, California 91101 MEDICAL AND IMMIGRATION EXAMINATION APPOINTMENT INSTRUCTIONS FOR MEDICAL EXAMINATION A MEDICAL EXAMINATION IS NECESSARY AS PART OF YOUR APPLICATION FOR ADJUSTMENT OF STATUS TO THAT OF A PERMANENT RESIDENT. AN APPOINTMENT HAS BEEN MADE FOR YOU TO BE EXAMINED BY A DOCTOR OF THE U.S. PUBLIC HEALTH SERVICE AT: ADDRESS: U.S.Public Health Service DATE: Friday, July 24, 1970 825 So. Sesson Street San Pedro, California 90731 TIME: 2:30 PM IF YOU DO NOT SPEAK ENGLISH, YOU SHOULD BE ACCOMPANIED BY A PERSON OF YOUR OWN SEX WHO CAN ACT AS INTERPRETER. BRING WITH YOU THIS LETTER, THE TWO ATTACHED COPIES, AND THE FOLLOWING TO THE PUBLIC HEALTH SERVICE FACILITY MENTIONED ABOVE: 1. X-RAY FILM (14" x 17") OF YOUR CHEST. FILM MUST NOT BE MORE THAN 30 DAYS OLD AND INTERPRETED BY A LICENSED PHYSICIAN. 2. SEROLOGY REPORT. SEROLOGIC TEST FOR SYPHILIS MUST NOT BE MORE THAN 30 DAYS OLD. THIS X RAY AND TEST MUST BE ACCOMPLISHED BY A LICENSED PHYSICIAN OR A STATE OR LOCAL HEALTH DEPARTMENT APPROVED LAB ORATORY IF YOU DO HAVE A PERSONAL PHYSICIAN, YOU MAY WISH TO TELEPHONE YOUR STATE OR LOCAL HEALTH DEPARTMENT FOR THE NAME OF AN LABORATORY REQUIRED. PLEASE SHOW THIS LETTER TO YOUR DOCTOR (OR LABORATORY) PERFORMING THE EXAMINATION AND FUR- NISH HIM WITH YOUR SIGNATURE, WRITTEN IN HIS PRESENCE FOR INCLUSION WITH HIS REPORT. SEE ATACHED LIST OF APPROVED HOSPITALS AND SPECIAL INSTRUCTIONS INSTRUCTIONS FOR IMMIGRATION INTERVIEW AN APPOINTMENT HAS ALSO BEEN MADE FOR AN INTERVIEW BEFORE AN IMMIGRATION OFFICER AT: ADDRESS: DATE: TIME: THE BELOW CHECKED ITEMS ARE NECESSARY FOR PROPER COMPLETION OF YOUR APPLICATION. BRING THEM WITH YOU AT THE TIME OF INTERVIEW: (IF NONE CHECKED, JUST APPEAR AT THIS OFFICE AFTER YOUR MEDICAL EXAMINATION IS COMPLETED. BIRTH CERTIFICATE MARRIAGE CERTIFICATE FORM I-134, AFFIDAVIT OF SUPPORT. A FORM IS ENCLOSED FOR YOUR USE TWO IDENTICAL PASSPORT - SIZED PHOTOGRAPHS (2"x2") YOUR PASSPORT AND FORM I-94 OTHER: FORM I 486 DISTRICT DIRECTOR (REV. 10-15-69)
